evidence_extraction:
[
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "The white man, the white man is too intelligent to let someone else come and gain control of the economy of his community. But you will let anybody come in and control the economy of your community...",
  "If you're black, you should be thinking black. And if you're black and you not thinking black at this late date, well, I'm sorry for you.",
  "Whether you are a Christian or a Muslim or a nationalist, we all have the same problem. They don't hang you because you're a Baptist; they hang you 'cause you're black.",
  "It's liberty or it's death. It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.",
  "All she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.",
  "We're trapped, trapped, double-trapped, triple-trapped. Any way we go, we find that we're trapped.",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.",
  "you are wasting your time going to that government expecting redress. Instead you have to take that government to the world court and accuse it of genocide and all of the other crimes that it is guilty of today.",
  "And you and I have to make a start. And the best place to start is right in the community where we live.",
  "It will take black nationalism to bring about the freedom of 22 million Afro-Americans, here in this country, where we have suffered colonialism for the past 400 years.",
  "We both got the same objective, we just got different ways of getting' at it.",
  "The Man is becoming richer and richer, and you're becoming poorer and poorer.",
  "The white man made the mistake of letting me read his history books. ... He made the mistake of teaching me that Patrick Henry was a patriot...",
  "He tells you, I'm for separation and you for integration, and keep us fighting with each other. No, I'm not for separation and you're not for integration, what you and I are for is freedom.",
  "No direct evidence of Mudita found in the text. The focus is on the self-advancement of Black people, not celebration of others' success.",
  "The white man made the mistake of letting me read his history books. [laughter] He made the mistake of teaching me that Patrick Henry was a patriot...",
  "The white man can never win another war on the ground. His days of war – victory – his days of battleground victory are over.",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies. [laughter, applause]",
  "All of us catch hell from the same enemy. We're all in the same bag, in the same boat.",
  "Not only is he a crook, he's a hypocrite. Here he is standing up in front of other people, Uncle Sam, with the blood of your and mine mothers and fathers on his hands. With the blood dripping down his jaws like a bloody-jawed wolf.",
  "So today, though Islam is my religious philosophy, my political, economic and social philosophy is black nationalism. You and I – [applause]",
  "Whether you are a Christian or a Muslim or a nationalist, we all have the same problem. They don't hang you because you're a Baptist; they hang you 'cause you're black.",
  "I say in my conclusion, the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "It's liberty or it's death. It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.",
  "He keeps us divided in order to conquer us. He tells you, I'm for separation and you for integration, and keep us fighting with each other.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "The economic philosophy of black nationalism only means that we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.",
  "But, when you go to a church and you see the pastor of that church with a philosophy and a program that's designed to bring black people together and elevate black people, join that church."
]
Total quotes in analysis result: 30
